revised_title: Geometric Properties of Curves Fulfilling the Condition d²x² + d²y² = 0
tldr: The author demonstrates a geometric property of plane curves that fulfill the condition d²x² + d²y² = 0, proving that when these curves intersect at a double point, they do so at right angles. The paper also extends the theorem to show that at a multiple point, the branches make equal angles with each other.
